trans-unit.source: ) is supported but may behave strangely on some systems. See the “–glob” option’s help text for more info.
trans-unit.target: ）受到支持，但在某些系统上可能会出现异常情况。有关更多信息，请参见“ –glob”选项的帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: A GS to GS transfer using two GS URLs
trans-unit.target: 使用两个GS URL进行GS到GS的传输。

trans-unit.source: A S3 to S3 transfer using two S3 URLs
trans-unit.target: 使用两个S3 URL进行S3到S3的传输。

trans-unit.source: A custom S3 or GS URL to a directory or specific key in the format of s3://bucketname/path/or/key
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义的S3或GS URL,指向一个目录或特定的key,格式为s3://bucketname/path/or/key。

trans-unit.source: A local path to a directory or specific file
trans-unit.target: 一个目录或特定文件的本地路径

trans-unit.source: An rsync-like wrapper for boto's S3 and Google Storage interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 一个类似于rsync的包装器,用于boto的S3和Google Storage接口。

trans-unit.source: At this time, the script does not take advantage of boto’s “multipart” transfer methods. (pull requests welcome!)
trans-unit.target: 目前，该脚本没有利用boto的“多部分”传输方法。（欢迎拉动要求！）

trans-unit.source: By default, the script works recursively and differences between files are checked by comparing file sizes (e.g. rsync’s –recursive and –size-only options). If the file exists on the destination but its size differs from the source, then it will be overwritten (unless the -w option is used).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，脚本以递归方式工作，并且通过比较文件大小来检查文件之间的差异（例如，rsync的–recursive和–size-only选项）。如果文件位于目标位置，但其大小与源文件大小不同，则它将被覆盖（除非使用-w选项）。

trans-unit.source: Differences between keys/files are assumed only by checking the size.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过检查大小来假定密钥/文件之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Due to the nature of how directories work in S3/GS, some non-standard folder structures might not transfer correctly. Empty directories may also be overlooked in some cases. When in doubt, use “-n” first.
trans-unit.target: 由于目录在S3 / GS中的工作方式的性质，某些非标准文件夹结构可能无法正确传输。在某些情况下，空目录也可能被忽略。如有疑问，请先使用“ -n”。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue where the contents of local directories didn’t get copied into remote directories if the remote directory existed and was empty.
trans-unit.target: 修复了以下问题：如果远程目录存在并且为空，则本地目录的内容不会复制到远程目录中。

trans-unit.source: More information on boto’s advanced configuration options can be found here: http://boto.cloudhackers.com/en/latest/boto_config_tut.html
trans-unit.target: 有关boto的高级配置选项的更多信息，可以在这里找到：http : //boto.cloudhackers.com/en/latest/boto_config_tut.html

trans-unit.source: Switched from getopt to argparse for argument parsing.
trans-unit.target: 将参数解析从 getopt 改为 argparse。

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
trans-unit.target: 本软件按“原样”提供，不提供任何形式的明示或暗示担保，包括但不限于对适销性，特定用途的适用性和非侵权性的担保。在任何情况下，无论是由于与软件或软件的使用或其他处理有关，与软件有关的合同，侵权或其他行为，作者均不承担任何索赔，损害或其他责任。

trans-unit.source: This is Alpha software–always remember to use the “-n” option first!
trans-unit.target: 这是Alpha软件-始终记住首先使用“ -n”选项！

trans-unit.source: You might have to be root (or use sudo) for pip to install the script into a globally executable directory in your $PATH.
trans-unit.target: 你可能需要以root身份(或使用sudo)将pip安装到$PATH的全局可执行目录中。

trans-unit.source: You’ll need to have Python 2.5+ and pip installed.

boto supports the option to read access/secret keys from the environment or from a credentials file. Set the AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID/AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY or GS_ACCESS_KEY_ID/GS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variables or use boto’s advanced configuration options to set up a credentials file.
trans-unit.target: boto支持从环境或凭据文件中读取访问/秘密密钥的选项。设置AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID / AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY或GS_ACCESS_KEY_ID / GS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY环境变量，或使用boto的高级配置选项来设置凭证文件。

trans-unit.source: boto-rsync is a rough adaptation of boto’s s3put script which has been reengineered to more closely mimic rsync. Its goal is to provide a familiar rsync-like wrapper for boto’s S3 and Google Storage interfaces.
trans-unit.target: boto-rsync是对boto的s3put脚本的粗略改编，该脚本已进行了重新设计以更紧密地模仿rsync。它的目标是为boto的S3和Google Storage接口提供熟悉的类似rsync的包装器。

trans-unit.source: pip should automatically install boto for you, but the advanced user can find it here: http://github.com/boto/boto/
trans-unit.target: pip应该会自动为您安装boto，但是高级用户可以在这里找到它：http : //github.com/boto/boto/
